articles.title: DPRK Representative's Speech at UN General Assembly
articles.content:
DPRK Representative's Speech at UN General Assembly
 Pyongyang, October 6 (KCNA) -- The DPRL permanent representative to the UN made a speech at the Second Committee of UNGA 72nd Session on October 3.
					 He said:
					
					 Two years ago, "2030 Sustainable Development Goals" were adopted at the United Nations. This marked an important turn in thoroughly eliminating poverty on a global level and in encouraging the struggle for the development and prosperity of humankind.
					
					 The last two years' efforts of the international society for achieving sustainable development goals require to pay more attention to fully implementing the sustainable development goals in such complicated situation and to make collective and practical responses.
					
					 The creation of peaceful environment, the fundamental basis for the sustained development, is a matter of critical importance in achieving the sustainable development goals in a comprehensive way.
					
					 Under the deceptive signboard of "war on terrorism", "human rights" and "democracy", the U.S. continues to seek regime changes in sovereign countries without any hesitation.
					
					 Such actions of the U.S. that are rampant worldwide are open challenge to the fundamental spirit of the sustained development goals that seek common development and prosperity of all countries without any prejudice against a particular country.
					
					 The U.S. even withdrew from the Paris Convention on climate change, which is one of the sustainable development goals, in a direct challenge to the desire and will of the international society. This illustrates the negative stand of the U.S. towards the sustainable development goals.
					
					 To achieve the sustainable development goals, set to promote the well-being of humankind, first, we should immediately obliterate the high-handed measures of the U.S. including the sanctions imposed on the developing countries and promptly terminate the U.S. measures against humanity and civilization that are trying to destroy modern civilization and plunge this world into the medieval darkness.
					
					 At the same time, the implementation of these goals should be the process of destroying the monopolistic position of a few specific countries in international monetary and trade system and of establishing the equal, fair and new international economic relations on the principle of fully ensuring the representative rights of developing countries including the newly emerging economic powers.
					
					 The DPRK government will in the future, too, exert great efforts to abolish the old international order and establish the new international economic relations based on justice, equality and impartiality and also make active contributions to international efforts to accomplish the sustainable development goals.

articles.title: DPRK Representative on Principled Stand of DPRK on Terrorism
articles.content:
DPRK Representative on Principled Stand of DPRK on Terrorism
 Pyongyang, October 6 (KCNA) -- The DPRK representative clarified a principled stand of the DPRK government on terrorism at the Sixth Committee of UNGA 72nd Session.
					 He said:
					
					 At the UNGA held in June, the resolution to establish the United Nations Counter-Terrorism Office was unanimously passed.
					
					 The establishment of the Counter-Terrorism Office completed the framework of international organization which can implement the Global Counter-Terrorism Strategy and can effectively control the cooperation of countries.
					
					 The most important thing in fighting against terrorism is to clearly analyze the root cause of terrorism and to strengthen the cooperation of the international community based on that clear assessment.
					
					 The main reason international terrorism is not yet annihilated is because a particular country is using the "counter-terrorism" agenda to seek its selfish political interests, gravely undermining world peace and security.
					
					 Just like a chameleon changes its colors, the U.S. frequently changed the pretext of "counter-terrorism" and "non-proliferation" according to its need, and used them to overthrow legitimate governments in Afghanistan, Iraq and Libya one by one by waging military attacks on those countries.
					
					 Now the U.S. is scheming to overthrow the legitimate government of Syria, by continuously stretching out its claws of aggression into the internal war of that country, under the pretext of "counter-terrorism".
					
					 As it is well-known, the essence of the "war on terror" by the U.S. is a state terrorism with the purpose of regime change in countries that are not favorable to the U.S. and a new form of war of aggression that gives the humankind nothing but disaster and misfortune.
					
					 In May this year, a group of heinous terrorists who infiltrated into our country on the orders of the Central Intelligence Agency (CIA) of the U.S. and the south Korean puppet Intelligence Service with the purpose of carrying out a state-sponsored terrorism against our supreme headquarters using biological and chemical substance were caught and exposed. This palpably shows the true nature of the U.S. as the main culprit behind terrorism.
					
					 The inveterate disapproval of other countries and nations, the extreme impertinence, interference into internal affairs and use of force aimed at regime changes and state-sponsored terrorism of the U.S. are the root cause of terrorism.
					
					 In this regard, the international community should define the root cause of terrorism and every country should maintain sharp vigilance not to fall victim to the "war on terror" conducted by the U.S. in rampant violation of the Charter of the United Nations and international laws.
					
					 It is a consistent stand of the DPRK government to oppose all forms of terrorism and any support to it.
					
					 The DPRK government has acceded to several international conventions on counter-terrorism including the "International Convention for the Suppression of the Financing of Terrorism" and "United Nations Convention against Transnational Organized Crime".
					
					 The DPRK government will continue to fulfill its responsibility to root out all forms of terrorism and to preserve peace and security of the Korean peninsula and the world.

articles.title: Head of DPRK Delegation on Peaceful Environment for Development of Science and Technology
articles.content:
Head of DPRK Delegation on Peaceful Environment for Development of Science and Technology
 Pyongyang, October 6 (KCNA) -- The 57th session of the General Assembly of the World Intellectual Property Organization was opened in Geneva, Switzerland on October 2.
					 The head of the DPRK delegation made a speech at the session on October 3.
					
					 He said that all activities of the organization should be directed to making the work to protect the intellectual property to practically contribute to meeting global challenges by dint of science and technology.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 The DPRK has achieved lots of inventions and new technology successes in various fields of the national economy over the past years, which contributed to the production of technical means including hi-tech equipment in reliance upon its own efforts, technology and resources and to the economic development and the improvement of the people's standard of living.
					
					 To develop the science and technology which promote the economic development of the country, it is needed to provide peaceful environment.
					
					 It is the present reality that state sovereignty as well as the right of people to existence and economic development including science and technology are gravely threatened by some specific states' high-handed policies to check the independent aspiration of developing countries by force.
					
					 As a typical example, the hostile forces are enforcing unprecedented unethical sanctions to smother the DPRK's socialist system and field of people's living.
					
					 The DPRK's economic development as a whole is put under the toughest sanctions as it has taken self-defensive measures for the protection of the sovereignty of the country and its right to existence.
					
					 But the reality shows that the tougher the hostile forces impose sanctions, the stronger the will and mental power of the Korean people to defend the Korean socialist system are growing.
					
					 He clarified the stand of the DPRK government to further develop the work for protecting intellectual property of the country and continue to develop the cooperative relations with the World Intellectual Property Organization and its member states.

articles.title: Congratulations to President of Mozambique Liberation Front Party
articles.content:
Congratulations to President of Mozambique Liberation Front Party
 Pyongyang, October 6 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea Thursday sent a congratulatory message to Filipe Jacinto Nwussi upon the successful holding of the 11th Congress of the Mozambique Liberation Front Party (MLFP) and his reelection as president of its Central Committee at the Congress.
					 His re-assumption of the important post of the president of the party is an expression of high trust and expectation of the Central Committee of the Party and all party members in him, the message said.
					
					 It expressed the conviction that the traditional friendly relations between the WPK and MLFP which have supported and cooperated with each other in the common struggle for independence against imperialism would grow stronger in the future, too.
					
					 The message sincerely wished the president greater success in his responsible work to strengthen the party and achieve the independent development and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: NPCK Spokesman Calls for Nationwide Struggle against Aggressors and Traitors
articles.content:
NPCK Spokesman Calls for Nationwide Struggle against Aggressors and Traitors
 Pyongyang, October 6 (KCNA) -- The struggle of people of different social standings opposing the U.S. domination, interference and moves for aggression and war and urging the withdrawal of Yankee aggression troops is running high in south Korea on the lapse of 64 years since the aggressive and humiliating south Korea-U.S. "mutual defense treaty" was cooked up.
					 In this regard, a spokesman for the National Peace Committee of Korea Friday made public a statement which said:
					
					 The South Side Committee for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration, the South Korean Federation of University Students in the 21st Century, the group of courageous youths and other organizations and people from all walks of life are actively staging the struggle through press conferences and meetings in demand of disbandment of the aggressive and humiliating alliance.
					
					 This is an eruption of the resolute will to drive the aggression forces who impose immeasurable misfortunes and sufferings upon the south Korean people and all other Koreans and try to ignite a nuclear war on this land and to regain the deprived sovereignty and dignity.
					
					 The south Korea-U.S. "mutual defense treaty" is an aggressive and traitorous war document the kernel of which is to keep the U.S. imperialist aggression forces in south Korea and its vicinity for an indefinite period, put the south Korean puppet army under their tight control and cope with the contingency on the Korean peninsula by joint military operation. It is the symbol of the U.S. military occupation of south Korea and the yoke for colonial domination.
					
					 Under this brigandish "treaty" the U.S. has reduced south Korea into the arsenal and advanced base for a nuclear war and aggravated the situation of the Korean peninsula to the extremes through ceaseless nuclear war gambling against the north, while styling itself an entity of extraordinary privileges.
					
					 The U.S. gangster-like moves for domination, subjugation, aggression and war are getting evermore reckless and dangerous in the wake of the frenzy of war thirsty Trump who spat out the remarks of "total destruction of north Korea" without hesitation.
					
					 The pro-U.S. traitors and confrontation maniacs in south Korea are fanning up such war hysteria of the U.S., while calling for "strengthened alliance to cope with the nuclear threat from the north".
					
					 The south Korean people can not get rid of the miserable misfortunes and sufferings and the whole nation cannot evade the tragedy of division and nuclear war disaster as long as the U.S. military occupation and domination over south Korea which have lasted for more than seven decades continue and the treacherous moves of the pro-U.S. sycophants are allowed to continue.

articles.title: Russian Party Delegation Leaves
articles.content:
Russian Party Delegation Leaves
 Pyongyang, October 6 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the Liberal Democratic Party of Russia led by Morozov Anton Yurevich, member of the Supreme Council and member of the Committee for International Affairs of the party, went back home Friday.

articles.title: Thai Juche Idea Study Organization Delegation Here
articles.content:
Thai Juche Idea Study Organization Delegation Here
 Pyongyang, October 6 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Organization for the Study of the Juche Idea of Thailand led by Chairman Songchit Pullarp arrived here on Friday.

articles.title: Congratulatory Message to Kim Jong Un from Syrian President
articles.content:
Congratulatory Message to Kim Jong Un from Syrian President
 Pyongyang, October 6 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, received a congratulatory message from Bashar Al-Assad, president of the Syrian Arab Republic, on October 4.
					 In the message the president extended heartfelt congratulations on behalf of the Syrian Arab people and on his own behalf to Kim Jong Un on the occasion of the 72nd founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea which falls on October 10. He hoped that Kim Jong Un would always make successes in good health and happiness and the people of the DPRK would achieve greater progress and prosperity.
					
					 The president expressed the conviction that the joint efforts of the leadership of the two countries would play a positive role in strengthening the bilateral friendly and cooperative relations in conformity with the wellbeing and interests of the friendly peoples of the two countries.

articles.title: Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from Foreign Diplomats
articles.content:
Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from Foreign Diplomats
 Pyongyang, October 6 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un received floral baskets and congratulatory letters from the diplomatic corps and the military attaches corps here on the occasion of the 72nd anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 They were handed over to Ri Su Yong, member of the Political Bureau and vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the WPK, by Ismail Ahmed Mohamed Hasan, Palestinian ambassador to the DPRK who is doyen of the diplomatic corps, and to Army General Pak Yong Sik, minister of the People's Armed Forces, by Alexei Bartusov, Russian military attache who is doyen of the military attaches corps, on Friday.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from General Secretary of C.C., LPRP
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from General Secretary of C.C., LPRP
 Pyongyang, October 6 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un received a floral basket from Bounnang Vorachith, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party and president of the Lao People's Democratic Republic, on the occasion of the 72nd anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The floral basket was handed over to Ri Su Yong, member of the Political Bureau and vice-chairman of the C.C., WPK, by Phonekham Inthaboualy, Lao ambassador to the DPRK, on Friday.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Nigerian President
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Nigerian President
 Pyongyang, October 6 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un received a floral basket from Muhammadu Buhari, president and commander-in-chief of the Armed Forces of Nigeria, with the approach of the 72nd founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The Nigerian charge d'affaires ad interim handed over the floral basket to an official concerned on Friday.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, October 6 (KCNA) -- Members of the mission of the United Nations Population Fund here visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill Friday on the occasion of the 72nd anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 They laid a floral basket before the statues of the great leaders and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Japanese Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Japanese Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
 Pyongyang, October 6 (KCNA) -- A Japan-DPRK friendship delegation from Kyusu of Japan headed by Mamoru Kitahara, chairman of the Fukuoka Prefectural Japan-DPRK Friendship Association, visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung, on Friday.
					 Being briefed on the fact that the President was born and nurtured his high ambition for the revolution, spending his childhood, they looked round historic relics.
					
					 They planted trees around the old home.
					
					 The delegation also toured the Ryugyong General Ophthalmic Hospital, Pyongyang Primary School for Orphans, etc.

articles.title: Egyptian Military Attache Gives Reception
articles.content:
Egyptian Military Attache Gives Reception
 Pyongyang, October 6 (KCNA) -- Ragab Hussein Ragab, military attache of the Egyptian embassy here, gave a reception at the Taedonggang Diplomatic Club Friday on the occasion of the Egyptian Army Day.
					 Present there on invitation were Kim Hyong Ryong, vice-minister of the People's Armed Forces, generals and officers of the Korean People's Army, officials concerned, foreign diplomatic envoys and representatives of international bodies here and military attaches of foreign embassies.
					
					 Staff members of the Egyptian embassy were present.
					
					 Speeches were made at the reception.

articles.title: Celebration Meeting of Youth and Students
articles.content:
Celebration Meeting of Youth and Students
 Pyongyang, October 6 (KCNA) -- Youths and students met at the Central Youth Hall Friday to celebrate the 20th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Among those present were Choe Ryong Hae, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., WPK, vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and vice-chairman of the WPK Central Committee, officials concerned and youth league officials.
					
					 Jon Yong Nam, first secretary of the Central Committee of the Kimilsungist-Kimjongilist Youth League, made a report to be followed by speeches.
					
					 The reporter and speakers said that as Kim Jong Il was held at the top post of the WPK it became possible for the Party to demonstrate its might as an invincible revolutionary party which shines along with the august name of the President and for the army and people to victoriously advance the cause of Juche revolution, the cause of building a socialist power under the leadership of the Party despite tempests of history.
					
					 They said that Kim Jong Il strengthened the youth league into the youth organization intensely loyal to the party and the leader and trained the youths to be dependable successors and stalwart fighters of carrying out the cause of Juche revolution, and thus opened new heyday of youth movement.
					
					 The cause of building Juche-based party led by Kim Jong Il has been brilliantly carried forward by respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un, they said, and went on:
					
					 Under his trust and loving care the youth league has grown to be the league shining with the august names of the great leaders and the youth movement has greeted the heyday of its development.
					
					 They stressed the need for all the youths to strive for the final victory of the cause of Juche revolution under the guidance of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Celebration Meeting of Women's Union Members
articles.content:
Celebration Meeting of Women's Union Members
 Pyongyang, October 6 (KCNA) -- A meeting of women's union officials and members took place at the Hall of Women Friday to celebrate the 20th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and its 72nd anniversary.
					 Present there were officials concerned and officials and members of the women's union.
					
					 Jang Chun Sil, chairwoman of the C.C., Socialist Women's Union of Korea, made a report to be followed by speeches.
					
					 The reporter and speakers said that the WPK history of 70-odd years is an ever-victorious history in which it created a new history of revolutionary party building and has grown to be the glorious party of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, holding in high esteem the great leaders in the van. 
					
					 They noted that the WPK, under the guidance of Kim Jong Il, had developed into a revolutionary party in which the ideological and guidance system of leader is firmly established, a motherly party which become a harmonious whole with the popular masses and an invincible party with strong discipline and combat efficiency.
					
					 They referred to the fact that he had made ceaseless high-intensity forced march till the last moments of his revolutionary life to provide eternal cornerstone for the prosperity of the country, holding high under the treasures sword of Songun.
					
					 His feats will shine long with the history of the WPK and he will be always alive as the eternal head of the WPK and the Sun of Juche, they stressed.
					
					 They called for fully demonstrating the revolutionary stamina of the Korean women in the great advance of Mallima under the guidance of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Then, there was a performance by the art squad of the C.C., the women's union.

articles.title: Oratorical Meeting of Agricultural Workers Held
articles.content:
Oratorical Meeting of Agricultural Workers Held
 Pyongyang, October 6 (KCNA) -- An oratorical meeting "Glory to Our Great Party" by agricultural workers took place at the People's Palace of Culture on Friday to celebrate the 20th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and its 72nd birthday.
					 Among those present were Kim Chang Yop, chairman of the Central Committee of the UAWK, officials concerned and agricultural workers.
					
					 Speakers at the meeting lauded the feats of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il for party building.
					
					 They said that Kim Jong Il went through difficulties to build up the nuclear force, adding that thanks to his devotion and painstaking efforts, this land witnessed a new era of prosperity and that he is wishing the nuclear power of Juche, the world's military power. 
					
					 They also stressed that the bosom of the Workers' Party of Korea is the eternal loving care and the bosom of the great sun to which our destiny and future are entrusted.
					
					 And they told about the noble benevolent politics, all-embracing politics of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un and expressed the determination to make a contribution to the building of a thriving country with grain production, bearing in mind the great love and trust of the great leaders.
					
					 They also stressed the need to glorify the Conference of Mallima Frontrunners with bumper harvest.

articles.title: Apple Sampling Meeting Held
articles.content:
Apple Sampling Meeting Held
 Pyongyang, October 6 (KCNA) -- A meeting for sampling apples harvested from fruit farms across the country this year was held at Unjong Tea House Friday. 
					 Officials and working people in the fruit field brought about a rich harvest despite unfavorable meteorological and climatic conditions by cultivating apple trees with all sincerity while planting high-yielding, delicious and superior-strain fruit trees.
					
					 Judges, selected from people, sampled apples of scores of species presented from Taedonggang Combined Fruit Farm, Kosan Combined Fruit Farm and fruit farms in Kwail County and Pukchong County to estimate their sweetness, sourness, fragrance and moisture.

articles.title: Current Stabilization Technology Developed in DPRK
articles.content:
Current Stabilization Technology Developed in DPRK
Pyongyang, October 6 (KCNA) -- Big efforts have been paid to producing more and practicing economy in the DPRK under the slogan of self-reliance and self-sufficiency.
					As part of the efforts, the current stabilization technology developed by the Mangyongdae District Science and Technology Commission in Pyongyang has been introduced into many industrial establishments like Pyongyang Lift Factory, proving very effective.
					
					In this regard, Yun Kuk Hwan, an official of the commission, told KCNA:
					
					The current stabilization technology was applied to different transformers and AC welders.
					
					The current stabilization AC welder consumes at least 30-40 percent less electric power than the existing AC welder, while ensuring power efficiency at 95 percent.
					
					The current stabilization technology helps reduce the transmission loss of electricity by improving power-factor.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Eliminating Conservative Forces
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Eliminating Conservative Forces
 Pyongyang, October 6 (KCNA) -- To wipe out the conservative forces is the primary task for realizing the aspiration and demand of south Korean people for new politics and new life, Rodong Sinmun Friday says in an article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 These days in south Korea the crimes of vicious suppression of the progressive forces during the traitor Lee Myung Bak regime have been disclosed one after another to spark off great uproar of people from different social standings.
					
					 Much upset by this the Lee Myung Bak group is shamelessly denying all the facts, pretending ignorance of their crimes. This is the height of impudence and intolerable mockery of and challenge to the south Korean people who have turned out in the struggle to eliminate the conservative evils. 
					
					 The extra-large political terrorist crimes committed by Lee Myung Bak were continued and became more horrible in the period of the traitor Park Geun Hye regime.
					
					 Park Geun Hye was disgracefully ousted and imprisoned by the hatred and rejection of the people. It is the natural conclusion for her traitorous crimes.
					
					 Now the conservative forces are making desperate efforts to revive the conservative regime swimming against the trend of the times.
					
					 The reality shows that if Lee Myung Bak and Park Geun Hye, who resorted to pro-U.S. sycophancy, fascist dictatorship and confrontation with the compatriots, are allowed to go at large, the conservative evils can never be eliminated and the remnants of conservatism would revive and the aspiration of the south Korean people for independence, democracy and reunification would face grave challenges.

articles.title: Minju Joson Slams Anti-DPRK Vituperation of S. Korean Puppet Forces
articles.content:
Minju Joson Slams Anti-DPRK Vituperation of S. Korean Puppet Forces
 Pyongyang, October 6 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet forces are letting out all sorts of vituperation over the speech made by the foreign minister of the DPRK denouncing old lunatic Trump who made bellicose remarks against the DPRK at the UN General Assembly.
					 Commenting on the fact, Minju Joson in a commentary Friday says:
					
					 The Democratic Party coteries are talking about "apology", terming the speech "the one threatening peace through original vulgar language and slander". Those of the conservative dissident parties including the Liberal Korea Party branded the speech as the "height of impudence", a "provocation prompting the complete ruin of the north's regime" and "an act little short of digging one's own grave".
					
					 Not content with highly praising the rubbish made by the world's boss of gangsters, the south Korean puppet forces curried favor with their master, while faulting the speech made by the foreign minister of the DPRK. This is a despicable act that can be committed only by senseless and deranged men seized by sycophancy toward the U.S. and confrontation with the fellow countrymen.
					
					 At a time the army and people of the DPRK have turned out in the final battle for confrontation with the U.S. to wrest a thousand-fold price from Trump, the puppet forces have gone mischievous, recklessly kicking up the racket for confrontation. This is nothing but the last-ditch efforts of senseless traitors prolonging their remaining days with sycophancy toward the U.S.
					
					 It goes without saying that the south Korean puppet forces can not evade the miserable fate of facing nuclear holocaust together with their master should they dance to the tunes played by Trump of the U.S., the sworn enemy of the Korean nation.
					
					 We will tame with fire such war maniacs as Trump and will certainly settle accounts with the American-raised rabid dogs holding political power in south Korea.

articles.title: S. Korean Expeditionary Group's Anti-War Struggle in U.S.
articles.content:
S. Korean Expeditionary Group's Anti-War Struggle in U.S.
 Pyongyang, October 6 (KCNA) -- An expeditionary group for peace formed by the People's Democratic Party of south Korea staged an anti-war peace demonstration in Los Angeles of the U.S. on Oct. 2, according to the south Korean internet paper Minjok Ilbo.
					 The group went on a hunger strike outside the White House from September 27 to denounce the U.S. war moves and call for DPRK-U.S. peace negotiation. The members of the group continued the struggle in Los Angeles together with anti-war organizations there. 
					
					 They added to the struggle, chanting slogans "Conclude DPRK-U.S. peace treaty at once!" and "U.S. troops, leave south Korea at once!"

articles.title: DR Congo Posts Kim Jong Un's Work on Its Website
articles.content:
DR Congo Posts Kim Jong Un's Work on Its Website
 Pyongyang, October 5 (KCNA) -- The National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of Democratic Congo posted the full text of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's work "The Cause of the Great Party of Comrades Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il Is Ever-Victorious" on its website on Oct. 1 to mark the 72nd birthday of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The work, published on Oct. 4, Juche 104 (2015), clarifies that the 70-year history of the WPK is a history of victory that demonstrated the validity and invincibility of the cause of the party of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and that the Party's cause is invincible.

articles.title: Kim Jong Suk's Career and Feats Praised by Foreign Media
articles.content:
Kim Jong Suk's Career and Feats Praised by Foreign Media
 Pyongyang, October 6 (KCNA) -- Russian and British media dedicated articles to the 68th demise anniversary of anti-Japanese war heroine Kim Jong Suk from Sept. 19 to 27.
					 Russia's paper Tomskaya Nedeli, online magazine Lemchich and other media carried articles under such titles as "Comrade Kim Jong Suk always alive in the hearts of the world people" illustrated with photos and pictures showing her revolutionary career and feats.
					
					 The articles lauded the great career and feats of Kim Jong Suk who devoted her all to the country, the revolution and comrades, stressing that her life was short but her noble image as a great person is kept deep in the mind of the Korean people and the world's progressives.
					
					 The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy posted on its website an article titled "The great mother of Korea".
					
					 Noting that Kim Jong Suk dedicated her all to the Korean revolution, the article said:
					
					 She is a noble model of the revolutionaries as she burnt her heart with the warm love for comrades and people and the spirit of devoted service to them.
					
					 Hers was a glorious life of bodyguard and a sacred life that provided sure guarantee for inheriting the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 Her feats will shine forever along with prosperous socialist Korea.

articles.title: Foreigners Blast U.S. Hostile Policy towards DPRK
articles.content:
Foreigners Blast U.S. Hostile Policy towards DPRK
 Pyongyang, October 6 (KCNA) -- Rallies were held in Katmandu and Berlin on Sept. 25 and 26 to denounce Trump for talking such nonsense as "totally destroying" the DPRK and the U.S. hostile policy towards the DPRK.
					 C. P. Mainali, general secretary of the C.C., Nepal Communist Party (Marxist-Leninist), said in a speech the U.S. president's anti-DPRK invectives at the UN General Assembly clearly showed that he does not want the peace and security in the Korean peninsula and the rest of the world.
					
					 The Nepalese people fully support all the self-defensive steps taken by the DPRK to protect the country and the nation and the global peace as just, he stressed.
					
					 The chairman of the Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany and other speakers noted that the U.S. and its vassal forces' moves to stifle the DPRK are arousing serious concern of the international community.
					
					 The hysteric madness of Trump, styling himself president of the "superpower", at the UN is a striking example that fully revealed his true colors as a politically immature and mentally deranged man, they said.
					
					 The U.S. will be sadly mistaken if it thinks sanctions and military threat can browbeat the DPRK, they said, adding that the world would soon clearly see how the DPRK tames the U.S. with fire.
					
					 The rally in Nepal adopted a solidarity message backing the just cause of the Korean people and condemning the U.S. hostile policy towards the DPRK.

articles.title: Peruvian Parties and Bodies Blast Trump's Reckless Remarks
articles.content:
Peruvian Parties and Bodies Blast Trump's Reckless Remarks
Pyongyang, October 6 (KCNA) -- We condemn the bellicose speech of the U.S. ruler as anachronistic reckless remarks.
					The Peruvian Communist Party, the Communist Party of Peru (Red Motherland), the Revolutionary Socialist Party of Peru, the General Kim Jong Il Peruvian Amicable Institute, the Peruvian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, the Peruvian Association for the Study of Revolutionary Activities of Comrade Kim Jong Suk, the Peru-Korea Friendship Institute for Study of the Juche Based Songun Policy, and other political parties and organizations in Peru said this in a joint statement on Sept. 28 to condemn the bellicose remarks of the U.S. ruler against the DPRK.
					
					The statement expressed deep concern about the touch-and-go situation prevailing in the Korean peninsula due to the ceaseless war drills and sanctions and pressure against the DPRK by the U.S.
					
					Because of the recent rude speech of the U.S. president at the world's biggest official diplomatic arena, there was a coldhearted atmosphere in the UN, the statement said, adding:
					
					The speech of the U.S. chief executive characterized by threats and provocations against the DPRK showed once again the real nature of the U.S. as a gangster hell-bent on abusing the UN as a means to justify its aggression and pressurize other sovereign states.
					
					The UN should urge the U.S. to withdraw its aggressor troops and war equipment from the Korean peninsula and repeal the unjust "sanctions resolutions" infringing on the sovereignty of the DPRK.

articles.title: Representante coreano interviene en 2o comite de 72a sesion de la Asamblea General de la ONU
articles.content:
Representante coreano interviene en 2o comite de 72a sesion de la Asamblea General de la ONU
Pyongyang, 6 de octubre (ACNC) -- El dia 3, el representante permanente de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea ante la ONU hizo uso de la palabra en el segundo comite del 72a sesion de la Asamblea General de la ONU.
					Hace dos anos, quedaron establecidas las metas de desarrollo sostenible para 2030 en la escena de la ONU, hecho que devino una oportunidad importante para impulsar la lucha por eliminar finalmente la pobreza en escala mundial y alcanzar el desarrollo y prosperidad comunes de la humanidad, comenzo el orador y prosiguio:
					
					Los esfuerzos de los ultimos dos anos de la sociedad internacional por cumplir esas metas exigen prestar mayor atencion al problema de alcanzarlas en sentido general en la complicada situacion internacional de hoy y dar respuestas colectivas y practicas.
					
					Preparar el ambiente pacifico, base fundamental del desarrollo sostenible, resulta un problema clave relacionado con el cumplimiento total de las metas.
					
					Bajo la enganosa pancarta de "guerra antiterrorista", "derechos humanos" y "democracia", Estados Unidos continua con sus operaciones para derrocar los regimenes de los Estados soberanos.
					
					Esas acciones, que prosiguen en la arena mundial, devienen un desafio frontal al espiritu fundamental de las metas de desarrollo sostenible que aspiran al desarrollo y prosperidad comunes de todos los paises, sin excepcion alguna.
					
					En el tema de cambio climatico, fijado como una de las metas de desarrollo sostenible, EE.UU. se ha retirado de la Convencion de Paris desafiando a la aspiracion y anhelo de la sociedad internacional, lo cual evidencia su postura negativa a esas metas.
					
					A fin de alcanzar las metas presentadas para el fomento del bienestar de la humanidad, hay que poner punto final ahora mismo a las medidas coercitivas como la sancion, que se imponen a los paises en vias de desarrollo, y a los actos antieticos e incultos de EE.UU. tendentes a destruir la civilizacion moderna y hacer al mundo retroceder a la epoca oscura medieval.
					
					Al mismo tiempo, ese trabajo debe ser impulsado como proceso para establecer nuevas relaciones economicas internacionales de caracter igualitario e imparcial en el principio de desmantelar la posicion monopolista que ocupan pocos Estados especificos en el actual sistema financiero y comercial internacional, y garantizar con suficiencia la representatividad de los paises en vias desarrollo, inclusive las nuevas potencias economicas emergentes.
					
					El gobierno de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea procurara establecer nuevas relaciones economicas internacionales, basadas en la justicia, igualdad e imparcialidad, rompiendo el viejo orden internacional y contribuira a los esfuerzos internacionales por alcanzar las metas en cuestion.

articles.title: Representante coreano expone la posicion del gobierno de la RPDC sobre el terrorismo
articles.content:
Representante coreano expone la posicion del gobierno de la RPDC sobre el terrorismo
Pyongyang, 6 de octubre (ACNC) -- En el debate de la agenda "Medidas para la eliminacion del terrorismo internacional" en el sexto comite de la 72a sesion de la Asamblea General de la ONU, el representante coreano expuso la posicion de principios del gobierno de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea sobre el terrorismo. 
					La fundacion de la oficina del antiterrorismo de la ONU, segun la resolucion sobre el respecto aprobada por unanimidad en junio pasado por la Asamblea General de la ONU, preparo el marco internacional para implementar la estrategia mundial del antiterrorismo y coordinar con mas eficiencia la cooperacion entre los paises, dijo el y continuo:
					
					Lo mas importante en el antiterrorismo es analizar claramente las causas del terrorismo y fomentar a base de ello la cooperacion de la sociedad internacional. 
					
					El factor principal de la no eliminacion de los actos terroristas internacionales reside en que un pais especifico destruye gravemente la paz y seguridad del mundo malempleando ese problema en sus designios politicos egoistas. 
					
					Alternando como camaleon el cartel de "antiterrorismo" y el de "la no proliferacion", EE.UU. ataco y derroco con armas uno por otro a los gobiernos legitimos de Afganistan, Iraq y Libia. 
					
					Bajo el rotulo de "antiterrorismo", echa ahora sus tentaculos de agresion en la guerra civil de Siria a fin de derrocar el gobierno legitimo de este pais.
					
					La "guerra antiterrorista" de EE.UU. es en su esencia un acto terrorista de Estado encaminado a cambiar el poder en los paises, que no le agradan, y la nueva version de la guerra de agresion que impone solo desastres y desagracias a la humanidad.
					
					En mayo pasado, se ha descubierto una banda de terroristas barbaros que a las ordenes de la CIA y el Servicio Nacional de Inteligencia del Sur de Corea, se ha infiltrado en el interior de nuestro pais para el atentado terrorista de Estado con sustancias bioquimicas contra nuestra Direccion Suprema.
					
					Este incidente es otro ejemplo que muestra plenamente el atributo de EE.UU. como promotor principal del terrorismo.
					
					Las causas de ese flagelo radican en el veto cronico de EE.UU. a otros paises y naciones y su extremada arrogancia, intervencion en asuntos internos, uso de fuerzas armadas y actos terroristas de Estado para el cambio de poder.
					
					En ese sentido, la sociedad internacional debe esclarecer primero las causas del terrorismo y cada pais ha de tener especial cuidado para que no sea victima de la "guerra antiterrorista" de EE.UU. que viola flagrantemente la Carta de la ONU y el derecho internacional.
					
					El gobierno de la RPDC mantiene su invariable posicion de rechazar todas formas de terrorismo y cualquier apoyo al mismo y por esta razon, ha firmado algunos convenios internacionales sobre el antiterrorismo, inclusive la "Convencion Internacional por la Supresion del Financiamiento del Terrorismo" y la "Convencion de la ONU contra el Crimen Organizado Transnacional".
					
					En lo adelante tambien, el gobierno de la RPDC cumplira con toda su responsabilidad y obligacion para erradicar de raiz el terrorismo y preservar la paz y seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana y el resto del mundo.

articles.title: Jefe de delegacion coreana demanda ambiente pacifico para el desarrollo de ciencias y tecnicas
articles.content:
Jefe de delegacion coreana demanda ambiente pacifico para el desarrollo de ciencias y tecnicas
Pyongyang, 6 de octubre (ACNC) -- Quedo inaugurada el dia 2 en Ginebra, Suiza, la 57a sesion de la Asamblea General de la Organizacion Mundial de la Propiedad Intelectual (WIPO).
					Intervino el dia 3 en esa reunion el jefe de la delegacion coreana.
					
					En su discurso, el opino que todas las actividades de WIPO deben orientarse a que la proteccion de propiedades intelectuales contribuya sustancialmente a resolver los desafios mundiales con ciencias y tecnicas, y prosiguio:
					
					Anteriormente, se han logrado en la RPDC muchas invenciones y resultados de nuevas tecnologias en varias ramas de la economia nacional y se producen y se abastecen con las fuerzas, tecnicas y recursos domesticos los equipos sofisticados y otros medios tecnicos que hacen aporte al desarrollo de la economia y la mejora de vida poblacional.
					
					Es imperioso preparar el ambiente pacifico para desarrollar las ciencias y tecnicas que impulsan el desarrollo de la economia nacional.
					
					Debido a la politica despotica de un Estado especifico tendente a impedir con fuerza la aspiracion independiente de los paises en vias de desarrollo, se ven amenazados seriamente no solo la soberania nacional, sino tambien el derecho a subsistencia del pueblo y el desarrollo de la economia, incluso en el plano cientifico-tecnico.
					
					A citar un ejemplo tipico, hoy dia, las fuerzas hostiles aplican la sancion antietica sin precedentes de la historia a fin de asfixiar el regimen socialista de la RPDC y hasta los sectores de la vida de su poblacion.
					
					Por la unica razon de tomar las medidas de autodefensa para defender la soberania y el derecho a la subsistencia del pais, la RPDC sufre injustamente la sancion mas dura sobre el desarrollo de su economia en general.
					
					Sin embargo, la realidad demuestra que mientras se tornan mas brutales las sanciones de las fuerzas hostiles, se multiplican la voluntad y la fuerza espiritual del pueblo coreano para defender con firmeza su regimen socialista.
					
					Al finalizar, el orador manifesto la posicion del gobierno de la RPDC de desarrollar mas las labores de proteccion de propiedades intelectuales en el pais y ampliar sin parar las relaciones de cooperacion con WIPO y los paises miembros.

articles.title: CNCDP llama a la lucha pannacional contra los agresores y traidores
articles.content:
CNCDP llama a la lucha pannacional contra los agresores y traidores
Pyongyang, 6 de octubre (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 64o aniversario de la fabricacion del "Tratado de Defensa Mutua" Sur de Corea-Estados Unidos de caracter agresivo y avasallante, se torna intensa en el Sur de Corea la lucha de los habitantes de diferentes sectores contra la dominacion, intervencion, agresion y maniobras de guerra de EE.UU. y por la retirada de tropas norteamericanas ocupantes del suelo surcoreano.
					Al respecto, el portavoz del Comite Nacional Coreano por la Defensa de la Paz (CNCDP) hizo publica el dia 6 una declaracion que sigue:
					
					El Comite Sureno para la Ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio, la Alianza de Universitarios del Sur de Corea del Siglo 21 y otras entidades y habitantes de diferentes circulos del Sur de Corea conceden las conferencias de prensa y los mitines en demanda de desmantelamiento de la alianza agresiva y subyugante.
					
					Esta lucha es una expresion de la decision resuelta de rescatar la soberania y dignidad de la nacion al expulsar a las fuerzas agresoras que impusieron incontable sufrimientos y penas a la poblacion surcoreana y toda la nacion y tratan ahora de desatar la guerra nuclear en el territorio patrio. 
					
					El "tratado" mencionado es el documento de guerra de caracter agresivo y traicionero que estipula desplegar por tiempo indefinido a los efectivos norteamericanos en el Sur de Corea y su contorno, concederles el control sobre el ejercito titere surcoreano y responder con la operacion militar conjunta en el tiempo de emergencia de la Peninsula Coreana. Por lo tanto, deviene el simbolo de la ocupacion militar de EE.UU. sobre el Sur de Corea y el yugo de dominacion colonial.
					
					En virtud del mismo pacto, EE.UU. se porto en el suelo surcoreano como ente extraterritorial, convirtio toda la extension geografica surcoreana en el polvorin de guerra nuclear y base avanzada nuclear y vino agravando al maximo la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana mediante la incesante campana de guerra nuclear anti-Norte de Corea.
					
					La dominacion y subyugacion de EE.UU. y sus tentativas de agresion y guerra se tornan mas imprudentes y llegan a la etapa peligrosisima con la fiebre belicosa del viejo maniaco Trump quien pronuncio sin vacilacion alguna el disparate de la "destruccion total del Norte".
					
					Los traidores proyanquis y maniacos de enfrentamiento del Sur de Corea alientan mas tal furia de EE.UU. abogando por "consolidar la alianza frente a la amenaza nuclear del Norte".
					
					Mientras prosigan la ocupacion militar y la dominacion de EE.UU. sobre el suelo coreano, que persisten mas de 70 anos, y los actos vendepatrias de los traidores proyanquis y serviles a grandes potencias, nunca se eliminaran las desgracias y sufrimientos de la poblacion surcoreana ni toda la nacion podra eludir los desastres de guerra nuclear, ademas de la tragedia de division territorial del pais.
